Text: "Saint Selection Ceremony"...? Never heard of it.

I'm not surprised. It's an event newly established
this year.

I don't know much about it either, but it's
apparently related to the Holidays.

I've been invited as a guest of honor, but it seems
like it's open to anyone. I expect many citizens will
attend.
You think I might find my niece there...?

Or perhaps someone who knows something about her
whereabouts. If you're interested, Lady Beatrix, why
don't you join me?

What a kind and unexpected offer. I would love to
participate.

In that case, I will contact the event organizers
immediately. I was informed we'll need special
ceremonial outfits for the occasion.
We'll have to change outfits?

It's typical for such events. As a princess, I've
done it on several occasions.

This is my first time attending the Saint Selection
Ceremony, so I don't know the details...but I'm sure
it will be a dignified outfit befitting its name.

You sure that's how it works? I'm not really used to
dressing up...

Heheh. You would look stunning in any outfit,
Lady Beatrix.

On the day of the Saint Selection Ceremony, the two
arrive at the venue...
Um, Lady Beatrix... Do you mind if I wear my coat...?

Didn't I just tell you? I'm confiscating this. I'm
sure everyone wants to see you in that outfit.

W-Wait! I need to mentally prepare myself before
going out in this—
Ohhh... This outfit is so embarrassing...
Not at all. It's adorable and looks great on you.

...That said, what does this outfit have to do with
the Saint Selection Ceremony?
Well, about that...

You both look stunning! Truly the leading contenders
for the contest!

Contest...? I thought I was participating in a
ceremony to choose the Saint.

You're not wrong! It's a beauty contest to select
the most fitting and beautiful Santa for the season—
that's the Saint Selection Ceremony!

When it's your turn, please make your way to the
stage. Best of luck!
...And she's gone. Princess Iris, what's going on?
I'm so sorry!

I completely misunderstood what the Saint Selection
Ceremony was about...

I thought it would be a solemn ceremony...where the
selected individual receives the title of "Saint" and
offers prayers—
But it was actually a beauty contest.

...Yes. Ignorance is no excuse. My oversight is to
blame.

I'll speak to the organizers to withdraw your
participation, Lady Beatrix—
No, that won't be necessary.
B-But...

I was taken aback, but I'm not opposed to it. You may
have invited me, but I chose to participate.

Besides, I might spot my niece on the stage if I
compete in this contest.
Lady Beatrix...

Plus...plenty of guests are expected at the event,
right? We shouldn't let them down.

(She's so considerate despite the unexpected
circumstances...)

(Lady Beatrix is right. I can't believe I was so
flustered by the outfit's design that I nearly
overlooked the most important thing—my people...)

(No matter the format, the Saint Selection Ceremony is
for the people. It's clear what I need to do...!)

I have also made up my mind. If we've chosen to
participate, let's give it everything we've got!

Hehe. Let's cheer each other on. Even if we don't
fully understand the details.
